mapper.sql: ID, password, hourseID, hourseName, name, gender, phone, email, label
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tablename} ( `ID` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '员工ID', `password` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '密码', `hourseID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '员工所属子仓库ID', `hourseName` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '仓库名字', `name` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '员工姓名', `gender` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '员工性别', `phone` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '员工手机', `email` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '员工电子邮件', `label` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '标志是否有效', PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='子仓库员工信息';
mapper.insert:
insert into sub_staff
ID,
password,
hourseID,
hourseName,
name,
gender,
phone,
email,
label,

#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sub_staff
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hourseName = #{hoursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sub_staff set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hourseName = #{hoursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
